name: backbone-redux-store
description: Redux store API for your Backbone Models and Collections. Works with or without Redux

scripts.test: npm lint && echo "Error: no test specified" && exit 1
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && babel --presets es2015 --plugins babel-plugin-transform-object-rest-spread -d dist/ lib/
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run test

author: Adam & Vitor
